quotes.quote: Performance is an act of faith.
Let your performance do the thinking.
Stamp your performance with excellence.
Peak performance is meditation in motion.
Performance should be made square with promise.
Improve your performance by improving your attitude.
Quality performance starts with a positive attitude.
When your image improves, your performance improves.
A powerful performance will transform everyone in the room.
Effective performance is preceded by painstaking preparation.
A performance is a conversation between you and an audience.
An ounce of performance is worth more than a pound of preachment.
When performance exceeds ambition, the overlap is called success.
Good performance is about what you take in, not what you put out.
Performance of one's duties should be independent of public opinion.
Performance is a vehicle for entering different worlds of experiencing.
Enjoying life is far superior to being graded on your performance in life.
Set excellent performance as your standard and strive to achieve it each day.
An amazing performance is always a reflection of awesome amounts of practice.
Promises may fit the friends, but non performance will turn them into enemies.
Typically, the performance has a story - a beginning, the crescendo and the end.
Your performance gets you promoted. It doesn't matter if you're brown, back or white.
If you don't back it up with performance and hard work, talking doesn't mean a thing.
A performance must capture or communicate with the mood and feelings of that very moment.
Performance stands out like a ton of diamonds. Nonperformance can always be explained away.
Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
The highest levels of performance come to people who are centered, intuitive, creative, and reflective - people who know to see a problem as an opportunity.
There is no strong performance without a little fanaticism in the performer.
Performance is the best way to shut people up.
All good performance starts with clear goals.
